text.*:
A fragmentary novel is a novel made of fragments, vignettes, segments, documents or chapters that can be read in isolation and/or as part of the greater whole of the book. These novels typically lack a traditional plot or set of characters and often are the product of a cultural crisis[1][2][3][4][5][6] The oldest fragmentary novels are part of the (proto)-picaresque novel tradition.[7][8] Some of these fragmented novels are also categorized as short story collections or epistolary novels. Some fragmentary novels are (posthumously) published unfinished novels or are partly lost novels.[9][10][11]

Examples in chronological order[edit]

  • Petronius - Satyricon (Late 1st century AD) (incomplete)
  • Apuleius - Asinus aureus (The Golden Ass) (Late second century AD)
  • François Rabelais - La vie de Gargantua et de Pantagruel (Gargantua and Pantagruel) (1532-1564)
  • Laurence Sterne - Tristram Shandy (1759)
  • Friedrich Schiller - Ghost-Seer (1789)
  • Novalis - Die Lehrlinge zu Sais (The Novices at Sais) (1798)
  • Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel - Lucinde (1799)
  • Novalis - Hymns to the night (1800)
  • Novalis - Heinrich von Ofterdingen (1802)
  • Karl Marx - Skorpion und Felix, Humoristischer Roman (Scorpion and Felix) (1837)
  • Henri Murger - Scènes de la vie de bohème (1849)
  • William Makepeace Thackeray - A Shabby Genteel Story (1857) (unfinished)
  • Jane Austen - The Watsons (1871) (unfinished in 1805)
  • Jean Paul - Der Komet oder Nikolaus Marggraf (1862)
  • Gustave Flaubert - Bouvard et Pécuchet (1881)
  • James Joyce - Dubliners (1914)
  • Sherwood Anderson - Winesburg, Ohio (1919)
  • António Ferro - Leviana: novela em fragmentos (Frivolous) (1921)
  • Joseph Roth - Das Spinnennetz (The Spider's Web) (1923)
  • Ernest Hemingway - In our Time (1925)
  • John Dos Passos - Manhattan Transfer (1925)
  • Franz Kafka - Amerika (1927) (unfinished)
  • Evelyn Waugh - Vile Bodies (1930)
  • John Dos Passos - USA Trilogy (1930-1936)
  • Flann O'Brien - At Swim Two-Birds (1939)
  • Thomas Wolfe - The Hills Beyond (1941)
  • Scott Fitzgerald - The Last Tycoon (1941) (unfinished)
  • William Faulkner - Go Down, Moses (1942)
  • Robert Musil - Der Mann ohne Eigenschaften (The Man Without Qualities) (1943)
  • A.E. van Vogt - The Mixed Men (1945)
  • Raymond Queneau - Exercices de style (Exercises in Style) (1947)
  • Ray Bradbury - The Martian Chronicles (1950)
  • A.E. van Vogt - The Voyage of the Space Beagle (1950)
  • Ray Bradbury - The Illustrated Man (1951)
  • Franz Kafka - Wedding Preparations in the Country (1954) (unfinished)
  • William S. Burroughs - Naked Lunch (1959)
  • William Burroughs - The Soft Machine (1961)
  • Vladimir Nabokov - Pale Fire (1962)
  • Doris Lessing - The Golden Notebook (1962)
  • Julio Cortázar - Hopscotch (1963)
  • Kurt Vonnegut - Cat's Cradle (1963)
  • Giorgio de Chirico - Hebdomeros (1964)
  • Fritz Leiber - The Wanderer (1964)
  • Bob Dylan - Tarantula A Fragmentary Novel (1966)
  • Brautigan - Trout Fishing in America (1967)
  • Mikhail Bulgakov - Ма́стер и Маргари́та (The Master and the Margarita) (1967) (unfinished in 1940)
  • John Brunner - Stand on Zanzibar (1968)
  • Gilbert Sorrentino - Mulligan Stew (1968)
  • Jerzy Kosinski - Steps (1968)
  • Charlotte Strandgaard - Indimellem holder de af hinanden (Now and then they care for one another) (1969)
  • Kurt Vonnegut - Slaughterhouse-Five (1969)
  • J.G. Ballard - The Atrocity Exhbition (1970)
  • Tomás Rivera - …y no se lo tragó la tierra (…And the Earth Did Not Devour Him) (1971)
  • Ishmael Reed - Mumbo Jumbo (1972)
  • Italo Calvino - Le città invisibili (Invisible Cities) (1972)
  • B.S. Johnson - See The Old Lady Decently (1975)
  • Renata Adler - Speedboat (1976)
  • Michael Ondaatje - Coming Through Slaughter (1976)
  • Barry Hannah - Airships (1978)
  • Ingeborg Bachmann - The Book of Franza (1978) (unfinished)
  • Georges Perec - Life a User's Manual (1978)
  • Italo Calvino - Se una notte d'inverno un viaggiatore (If On a Winter's Night a Traveler) (1979)
  • Raymond Carver - What We Talk About When We Talk About Love (1981)
  • Philip K. Dick - VALIS (1981)
  • D.M. Thomas - The White Hotel (1981)
  • Fernando Pessoa - The Book of Disquiet (1982)
  • Astrid Roemer - Over de gekte van een vrouw (On the madness of a woman) (1982)
  • Keri Hulme - The Bone People (1984)
  • Sandra Cisneros - The House on Mango Street (1984)
  • Milorad Pavić - Hazarski rečnik (Dictionary of the Khazars) (1984)
  • Truman Capote - Answered Prayers (1986)
  • Ken Kesey - Demon Box (1986)
  • David Markson - Wittgenstein's Mistress (1988)
  • Marion Bloem - Vaders van betekenis (1989)
  • Georges Perec - 53 jours (1989) (unfinished)
  • W. G. Sebald - Vertigo (1990)
  • A.S. Byatt - Possession (1990)
  • Tim O'Brien - The Things They Carried (1990)
  • Michael Ondaatje - The English Patient (1992)
  • Susanna Kaysen - Girl, Interrupted (1993)
  • Carole Maso - Ava (1993)
  • Irvine Welsh - Trainspotting (1993)
  • David Markson - Reader’s Block (1996)
  • Don DeLillo - Underworld (1997)
  • Libuše Moníková - Der Traumel (2000)
  • Mark Z. Danielewski - House of Leaves (2000)
  • Jim Crace - The Devil's Larder (64 short pieces) (2001)
  • Adi Sorek - Seven Matrons (2001)
  • David Markson - This is not a novel (2001)
  • Ian McEwan - Atonement (2001)
  • Hugo Burel - Tijeras de Plata (2003)
  • Anna Pammrová - Antieva (2003)
  • Audrey Niffenegger - The Time Traveler's Wife (2003)
  • David Mitchell - Cloud Atlas (2004)
  • Roberto Bolaño - 2666 (2004)
  • David Markson - Vanishing Point (2004)
  • Mark Z. Danielewski - The Fifty Year Sword (2005)
  • Mark Z. Danielewski - Only Revolutions (2006)
  • Daniel Handler - Adverbs (2006)
  • Olga Tokarczuk - Bieguni (Flights) (2007)
  • György Dragomán - The White King (2007)
  • David Markson - The Last Novel (2007)
  • Michael Müller (de) - Caoutchouc (2008)
  • Micheline Marcom - A Brief History of Yes (2008)
  • Elizabeth Strout - Olive Kitteredge (2008)
  • Geraldine Brooks - People of the Book (2008)
  • Vladimir Nabokov - The Original of Laura (2009) (unfinished in 1977)
  • Joanna Kavenna - The Birth of Love (2010)
  • Janusz Głowacki - Good Night, Dżerzi (2010)
  • Umberto Eco - Il cimitero di Praga (The Prague Cemetery) (2010)
  • Laurent Binet - HHhH (2010)
  • Jennifer Egan - A Visit from the Goon Squad (2010)
  • David Gordon - The Serialist (2010)
  • Tom Rachman - The Imperfectionists (2010)
  • T.C. Boyle - When the Killing's Done (2011)
  • Hari Kunzru - Gods Without Men (2011)
  • Bae Suah - 서울의 낮은 언덕들 (Recitation) (2011)
  • Tea Tulić - Kosa posvuda (Hair Everywhere) (2011)
  • David Foster Wallace - The Pale King (2011) (unfinished in 2008)
  • Zadie Smith - NW (2012)
  • Nguyễn Một - Moving against the sun (2012)

  • Ariana Harwicz - Die, My Love (2012)

  • Sergio De La Pava - Personae (2013)
  • Drew Gates - Blockpanda (2013)
  • Jenny Offill - Dept. of Speculation (2014)
  • Juan Alvarez - Nunca te quise dar en la jeta, Javier (Javier: I never wanted to beat you in your mug) (2015)
  • Rodrigo Hasbún - Los afectos (Affections) (2015)
  • Guillem López - Challenger (2015)
  • Peter Rock - Spells (2016)
  • Mishka Hoosen - Call it a Difficult Night (2016)
  • Carolyn Zaikowski - In a Dream, I Dance by Myself, and I Collapse (2016)
  • Michael Chabon - Moonglow (2016)
  • Han Kang - The White Book (2016)
  • Carla Badillo Coronado - Abierta sigue la noche (2016)
